knimeNode.name: Alignment-Based Replayer
knimeNode.shortDescription: This alignment-based replayer accepts one event log and one Petri net as input and outputs the optimal alignments for traces after replaying traces on Petri net. With this node, the cost can be set individually for each move on log/model.

fullDescription.intro:
Alignment-based replay is the state-of-the-art technique in conformance checking. Alignments provide a robust and detailed view on the deviations. For each trace from the event log after replaying, there is one alignment corresponding to it.
Sync move
The classification of the current event corresponds to the firing transitions in Petri net. In this case, during replaying, both the trace and process model move to next comparison.
Move on log
The classification of the current event don't have any corresponding firing transitions in Petri net. During replaying, the trace moves forwards but the state of process model doesn't change.
Move on model
The firing transitions in Petri net has no corresponding event in the trace. During replaying, the model moves forwards but the state of the event log doesn't change.
With this node, the cost can be set individually for each move on log/model.

fullDescription.option: The classifier chosen to classify the event log.

The strategy to replay the event log on Petri net. It includes
ILP Replayer.
The repalyer calculates the optimal alignment based on ILP.
Non-ILP Replayer.
A*-ILP Based Manifest Replayer.
This replayer is reserved for performance checking. It generates the Manifest to wrap the alignments.
The unified cost for move on log in non-negative integer. In default, it is 1.
The unified cost for move on model in non-negative integer. In default, it is 1.
The unified cost for sync move in non-negative integer. In default, it is 0.

The cost table for move on log with non-negative integer.
The cost table provides the ability to modify cost for each move. The unified move cost can assign the same cost to all items in the table.
The cost table for move on model in non-negative integer.
The cost table for sync move in non-negative integer.
